scripts.build: npx esbuild --bundle --format=esm --platform=node --outdir=dist/ --minify src/index.js src/transports/*.js; npx esbuild --bundle --format=esm --platform=browser --outdir=dist/client --minify client/src/*.js client/src/transports/*.js
scripts.lint: npx eslint src client/src example/*.js example/client/*.js --fix; npx prettier src client/src example/*.js example/client/*.js --single-quote --write
